des: "Super easy, endless combinations...a twist on the waffle cone, this sandwich has the hot-cold appeal of a la mode desserts. Napkins recommended!"
ins: Toast the frozen waffle, immediately spread with butter and cut the waffle in half. Place a scoop of ice cream on one half of the waffle, distributing evenly. Drizzle the ice cream with maple syrup; top the ice cream with the other half of the  waffle and gently press to seal the sandwich.
